augmented_topic: Food and Dining Out (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Science Fiction lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about food and dining out using neutral register
Students create original scifi themed content about food and dining out in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with technology
food and dining out with innovation
food and dining out with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
